description: Ubuntu gives an error message saying: "Sorry, something went wrong: Desktop file didn't specify Exec field". I think I would love the game and want it fixed soon.

Works fine on Ubuntu 20.10. Not a Triple-A game, but pretty good for such a small dev team. Won't mine your data (I assume) or coerce you into paying real money for imaginary hats, which is mostly what I care about. And the gameplay is fairly solid. Challenging enough to be rewarding, but not so awkward to control as to be upsetting. Would love to see more levels. Sorta wish the fox man had pants. The wookie effect is not so effective when the character has anatomically human legs.
Cannot get it to work on Zorin 13 maybe good on other systems looks good anyway.
